title: Blended Problem-Based Science Education Design for 21st-Century Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science knowledge and digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Culturally integrated science education program referencing the Indonesian educational context, developing a practical model reflecting feedback from current teachers and students

learning_goals: Students improve critical thinking skills by over 15% in the science problem-solving process through blended PBL
Students demonstrate creative problem-proposing abilities through culturally contextualized scientific inquiry
Learners apply scientific communication skills (presentation, feedback, documentation) through collaborative activities
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
